channel.title: ESCO on Yi Mei @ VUW
channel.description: Recent content in ESCO on Yi Mei @ VUW

item.title: Evolutionary Scheduling and Combinatorial Optimisation
item.description: This research focuses on solving complicated real-world optimisation problems, which are typically NP-hard. Examples include job shop scheduling, vehicle routing, research allocation and scheduling in cloud, and web service composition. It is normally hardly possible to solve these problems to optimality. We have developed effective evolutionary algorithms and meta-heuristics to search for near-optimal solutions in a short time budget.
